metadata.title: CVE-2024-50055 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:driver core: bus: Fix double free in driver API bus_register()For bus_register(), any error which happens after kset_register() willcause that @priv are freed twice, fixed by setting @priv with NULL afterthe first free.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
linux-aws package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
